p: The Moranâ€™s I statistic demonstrated no evidence of residual spatial autocorrelation (value = 0.004, p-value = 0.417). The histogram of the group level residuals had a normal distribution. The MOR was 1 and ICC less than 1%, indicating that very little of the variation in individual risk of seropositivity from the final model was associated with the factors operating at the homestead level.
